welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fort Worth, where the charm of the Old West meets modern city living. Get ready to experience our famous Stockyards, vibrant cultural scene, and friendly locals as you explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Big Joe's Pizza & Pasta
restaurants.description: Big Joe's Pizza & Pasta is a pizzeria located in Haltom City.

restaurants.name: Taco Casa
restaurants.description: Taco Casa is a mexican restaurant located in Haltom City.

restaurants.name: Sonic Drive-In
restaurants.description: Sonic Drive-In is a fast food restaurant located in Haltom City.
restaurants.address: 3424 Denton Hwy (at Webster St.), Haltom City, TX 76117

restaurants.name: Hoffbrau Steak & Grill House
restaurants.description: Hoffbrau Steak & Grill House is a steakhouse located in Haltom City.

restaurants.name: Ku's Sushi
restaurants.description: Ku's Sushi is a sushi restaurant located in Keller.
restaurants.address: 4613 Denton Hwy, Keller, TX 76248, Keller, TX 76248

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport houses all domestic flights and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Southwest Terminal
terminals.description: The Southwest Terminal at Love Field Airport is dedicated solely to Southwest Airlines and offers a streamlined check-in and boarding process for their passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to an hour before needing to reconnect.
